<?php
/**
 * Auto-generated code below aims at helping you parse
 * the standard input according to the problem statement.
 **/

fscanf(STDIN, "%d %d",
    $W, // width of the building.
    $H // height of the building.
);
fscanf(STDIN, "%d",
    $N // maximum number of turns before game over.
);
